name: Heather Dale
description: '''Heather Dale''' is a Canadian [[Celtic music|Celtic folk]] musician, author, entrepreneur, and [[filker]] who was inducted into the [[Aurora Awards|Canadian Science Fiction and Fantasy Association's]] Hall of Fame in 2020. Much of her music draws on [[Celtic mythology|Celtic]] and [[Matter of Britain|Arthurian legend]], but she also incorporates influences and instruments from other genres, including [[world music]]. She runs her own independent record label, Amphis Music, from its office in [[Toronto]], Ontario.
